quotes.quote: As exciting, difficult, and memorable as our past can be, there comes a time when we have to get on with living.
It's exciting to take control of your future instead of waiting for the phone to ring.
Just keep stirring the pot, you never know what will come up.
It's exhilarating to be alive in a time of awakening consciousness; it can also be confusing, disorienting, and painful.
Nothing is more exhilarating than philistine vulgarity.
Practice excited thinking until you become excited and exciting.
The exhilarating ripple of her voice was a wild tonic in the rain.
The most exciting attractions are between two opposites that never meet.
It's really exhilarating and exciting to be able to meet your fan base and see them in person, and see the lengths that they're willing to go to.
Exciting is a dull world to describe the wrestling business.

What is exciting is not for one person to be stronger than the other... but for two people to have met their match and yet they are equally as stubborn, as obstinate, as passionate, as crazy as the other.
There's a great joy in my giving. It's thrilling. It's exhilarating. It's important to be a part of sharing. It is my love. It is my joy.
It's just exciting to be part of something that is brand-new.
Everything is exciting. Who knows what will happen next?
What is exhilarating in bad taste is the aristocratic pleasure of giving offense.
Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather
There is nothing more exhilarating than to be shot at without result.
Exciting happiness is joy, celebration, travelling, being in bed with a woman you desire.
Exciting cities stay exciting, and boring cities stay boring.
Silence is exhilarating at first - as noise is - but there is a sweetness to silence outlasting exhilaration, akin to the sweetness of listening and the velvet of sleep.
Exciting literature after supper is not the best digestive.
There's always something exciting about small change.
Nothing more exhilarating ... than saving yourself by the simple act of waking.
One of the most exciting things in life is when you can't get enough of learning something you love.
It's an exhilarating play, and you come off tired, but thrilled.
Nothing is more exciting and bonding in relationships than creating together.
The most exciting place to discover talent is in yourself.
Every day is exciting when you don't live your life based on religion alone.
It's exciting and encouraging that the spirit of exploration is alive and that students see it occurring in their lifetime. These may well be the children that make it a reality.
One of the exhilarating parts of falling in love is discovering new things about one another, and seeing the world from a different point of view.
It is so exhilarating to realize that this is all here for our expansion and for our pleasure.
This is the most exciting part of being human. It is using our brains in the highest way. Otherwise we are just healthy animals
The most exciting acting tends to happen in roles you never thought you could play.
